alert.note: Alert for Florence; Forest; Northern Marinette County; Southern Marinette County (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 6:57PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Forest, southeastern Florence and northern Marinette Counties through 745 PM CDT... At 657 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles southwest of Goodman to 11 miles southwest of Pembine to 9 miles west of Wausaukee. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Wausaukee around 715 PM CDT. Pembine around 740 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Caldron Falls Rese, Beecher, Governor Thompson State Park, Silver Cliff, High Falls Reservoir, Aurora, Goodman County Park, Caldron Falls Reservoir, Mcclintock County Park and Niagara. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Florence; Forest; Northern Marinette County; Southern Marinette County
